subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings 
|goon=じん
|kanon=しん
|soon=ちん
|kun=はた-, はたしん-
|nanori=かな, たい, はだ, ひろ, まさ, やす
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Proper noun
Etymology 3
Usage notes
subSections.text: This reading is used to distinguish from the {{m|ja|漢音|tr=kan'on}} reading of {{m|ja|晋|tr=Shin||{{w|Jin dynasty}}}}, itself called {{m|ja|晋|tr=Susumu-shin}}. The senses are the same for Etymology 2 above.
